videos.title: Milton Copper Charge 1000 Water Bottle, Set of 1, 960 ml, Copper,Brown

feature_bullets: Helps in Losing Weight: Drinking water stored in a copper vessel regularly, aids in weight loss. Copper reduce inflammation and it is an effective remedy for ulcers and indigestion
Prevents Cancer: copper has strong antioxidant properties that help fight off the cancer-causing agents and radicals to stay away from the body. BPA Free : Yes

Improves the work of thyroid gland: Most common problem with people diagnosed with thyroid disease is that they have low levels of copper. Copper is a vital substance needed in melanin production in the body and regenerates new cells

Copper has the property of regenerating the white blood cells thereby strengthening the immune system. Prevents anaemia: A study has proven that copper helps keep the levels of iron and regulates the flow of iron in the blood vessels
Reduces the risk of cardiovascular problems: Cardiovascular ailments like hypertension is common today, copper helps in regulating blood pressure, heart rate and cholesterol and triglyceride levels

top_reviews.title: Waste of money don't buy it.
top_reviews.body: It is written by Milton 99% Cooper, but it is steel bottel with cooper color coating done on it. Because taste of water is same even after storing water for 8 to 19 hrs in it. I can say because I have cooper glass which I bought from local market water taste changes after storing water in it for 4 to 5 hrs. Totally waste of money please refund my money.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
It is written by Milton 99% Cooper, but it is steel bottel with cooper color coating done on it. Because taste of water is same even after storing water for 8 to 19 hrs in it. I can say because I have cooper glass which I bought from local market water taste changes after storing water in it for 4 to 5 hrs. Totally waste of money please refund my money.
Read more

top_reviews.title: NOT COPPER , JUST COLOURED
top_reviews.body: NOT COPPER. ITS COPPER COLOURED. The colour starts to wear off in a week. And you will start to taste the chemicals in the colour. UNHEALTHY. FAKE. DANGEROUS.Read more

top_reviews.title: Quality check
top_reviews.body: Writing about the company, products of Milton are used from ages. The product is very good . Easy to clean as instructed on the cover. The bottle is bit difficult to open at times . Talking about the piece I was delivered , it was damaged as shown in the picture. The seller should check the product before delivery. It is just that the company's name is deteriorating.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Writing about the company, products of Milton are used from ages. The product is very good . Easy to clean as instructed on the cover. The bottle is bit difficult to open at times . Talking about the piece I was delivered , it was damaged as shown in the picture. The seller should check the product before delivery. It is just that the company's name is deteriorating.
Read more

top_reviews.title: It is copper Polished bottle!!!
top_reviews.body: These item is duplicate ..as it is only cheap Polish on iron bottle...within 20-25 days it's inside material was visible..as you can see in these photoRead more

top_reviews.title: Dont get fooled by Brand Name. Not worth to buy
top_reviews.body: I trusted the name and bought this bottle but to my surprise it has turned out to be a worst product . Within couple of days usage it has shown deep dark spots inside the bottle with bad odour. Please dont buy this bottle and is also not worth the price !Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I trusted the name and bought this bottle but to my surprise it has turned out to be a worst product . Within couple of days usage it has shown deep dark spots inside the bottle with bad odour. Please dont buy this bottle and is also not worth the price !
